Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place où elle commercialise les vivres frais en fonctions des périodes.Actuellement elle vend la tomate et les condiments verts mais aimerai aussi ajouter à cela les vivres secs et parfois les plantains et bananes mais son capital ne lui permet pas de se lancer dans ce domaine d'où l'où l'importance de ce crédit pour elle parce qu'il permettra d'aller dans les brousses pour acheter ses vivre en gros et revenir les détailler. Elle économisera une partie du bénéfice que lui rapportera ce crédit pour la scolarité de ses enfants et réinvestira le reste dans son activité pour l'agrandir.
texts.en: Adeline is a young woman of 28, a single mother of four children whose ages range from 6 to 14 years old. All four of them attend school. She sells fresh, seasonal foods in a market in her locality. At the moment she is selling tomatoes and green condiments but she would also like to add other less perishable foodstuffs and sometimes plantains and bananas. However, her working capital does not permit her to branch out into this field. Thus this loan is very important to her as it will permit her to go to the countryside to buy foodstuffs in bulk for retailing. She will save a part of the profit that this loan will bring her so that she can pay school fees for her children. She will reinvest the rest in her business so as to expand it.

loans.use: to diversify her business by adding less perishable foods to the fresh foodstuffs she sells

loans.name: Juanita Eloiza

texts.es: Juanita tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, habita en casa propia conjuntamente con su esposo, tiene 1 hijos a su cargo. Cuenta con buenas referencias en la comunidad, el lugar cuenta con mas de 5 mil pobladores y la cliente vive en casa rustica en Morropn al Norte del Peru.  Cliente se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos, ademas de la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace mas de 4 años. Ella maneja estos dos negocios para diversificar sus ganacias. El prestamo lo solicita para invertirlo en  el arreglo del corral de los animales y para invertirlo en la venta de productos de belleza y de esa forma tenga mas ingresos para el sustento de su familia, y por ende una mejor condicion de vida en la zona. La inversion en este tipo de negocio la ayudarà a tener mas utilidades, puesto que el mercado es potencial para  el negocio, son 5 las personas que tiene este rubro y la venta semanal de la cliente es bueno como para que en un corto plazo sus ingresos se incrementen. Uno de sus objetivos primordiales es captar mas clientes y que la venta  sea al 100%, por lo que para lograr todo esto, se esfuerza con mucha responsabilidad y trabaja  desde muy temprano.
texts.en:
Juanita is 48 years old, in a civil marriage, and lives in her own house along with her spouse.  They have one dependent child.  She has good references in the community, a place with more than five thousand residents, and she lives in a simple house in Morropón in the North of Peru.  The loanee works in the sales of cosmetics, and also raising and selling small animals for the last 4 years or more.  She manages these two business in order to diversify her sources of income.

The loan she is asking for is to invest in repairs to her animals' corral and for investment in the sales of beauty products, and this will lead her to more income for sustaining her family, resulting in a better quality of life in her area.  The investment in her line of work will help her to have more options, as the market is very open for her business.  There are 5 people who work with the same business model, and the weekly sales to her customers are good for her because her income grows in a short time.

One of her principal goals is to gain more customers and make her sales 100%, for which success, she will need to have great strength and responsibility and work starting very early in the morning.

loans.use: to invest in repairs on her animals' corral and to invest in the sales of beauty products.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis con su anterior credikiva, compró bolsas plásticas, tubos de cartón, sacos, cabuya y papel celofán. Con esta inversión pudo aumentar el volumen de ventas y tenr un efectivo disponible para compras oportunas. En la actualidad está tan ntusiasmado que se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para acceder a un nuevo credikiva,  inversión con la que planea comrar empaques industriales y material reciclable para continuar fortaleciendo su negocio de reciclaje. Su mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Estoy my agradecido por el apoyo y espero que continuenayudando a fortalecer nuestro negocio. "
texts.en: Luis used his previous Kiva loan to buy plastic bags, cardboard tubes, sacks, twine, and cellophane paper. This investment allowed him to increase his sales and have cash available for timely purchases. His current enthusiasm brought him to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to access a new Kiva loan. He plans to invest in the purchase of industrial packaging and recyclable material so that he can continue to strengthen his recycling business. His message to Kiva financers is the following: "I am very grateful for the support and I hope you will continue to help us strengthen our business."

loans.use: to buy industrial packaging and recyclable material.

loans.name: Nelva

texts.es:
La socia Nelva continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende por el centro de la ciudad la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia,la socia vende lo que son chompas,polos,guantes,chuyos entre otros a sus clientes que le solicitan como turistas,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando para de esta manera poder seguir apoyando economicamente a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de chompas de alpaca para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Nelva continues to work selling handicrafts in the center of the city. She is a very happy and responsible person with a great desire to continue working for her family. She sells sweaters, shirts, gloves, and hats amont other things, and her clients are mainly tourists. She would like to be able to continue working this way, in order to continue supporting her family economically. 

With this loan Nelva will buy alpaca sweaters for her business. She is very grateful for the loan provided, and she promises to repay all loan quotas on time.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters for her business

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos de 51 años, un hombre  casado y padre de 2 hijos en las edades de 10 y 15 años, es el propietario de un taller de ebanistería donde elabora todo tipo de muebles de madera. Su negocio tiene 32 años de existencia y es producto de la tradición familiar; el vende directamente y desarrolla   todo el proceso productivo desde la compra de materias primas, insumos  el diseño, corte preparación, ensamble de muebles, acabado y venta de los mismos. Sus ventas las realiza de contado en aserraderos de la ciudad principalmente; la clientela de Carlos está conformada por vecinos del sector y referidos que conocen la calidad del trabajo con que en su taller producen los diversos muebles de sala comedor, alcoba etc. Con su negocio Carlos sostiene su hogar y espera que todos sus esfuerzos se vean reflejado en lograr que sus hijos terminen estudios superiores y sean personas exitosas en lo que emprendan. En la actualidad Carlos está aplicando a un credikiva con el cual comprara materia primas como madera  y una maquina cateadora   la cual se utiliza para alisar el material abombado, cuarteado para dejarlo plano. Con esta inversión Carlos tendrá un proceso mas efectivo, fabricará nuevos diseños y sus acabados aumentarán la calidad, lo cual se constituye en el éxito de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Carlos is 51 years old, married, and the father of 2 children ages 10 and 15. He is the owner of a cabinetry shop where he makes all kinds of wooden furniture. His business is 32 years old and has been in his family all this time. He sells directly to customers, and is responsible for all steps of the process from the purchase of raw materials and other ingredients, to the design, to the cutting and preparation of the wood, to assembling the furniture, and ending in the sale of the furniture. He makes his sales mostly by cash in the city; Carlos' clients are mostly neighbors and people who have been referred to him who know he produces high quality furniture and a variety of products. 

With his business, Carlos sustains his home and hopes that with his efforts his children will be able to finish their studies and be successful in whatever they do. Currently, Carlos is applying for this loan in order to buy raw materials such as wood and a sawing machine that he will use to smooth the wood and make it flat. With this investment, Carlos will have a more effective process, will be able to produce new designs, and will be able to improve the quality of his furniture, all of which would make this loan a successful one.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood and sawing machine that he will use to smooth the wood and make it flat

loans.name: Omon

texts.ru:
Омон житель района Шахритус. Ему 37 лет. Он женат, имеет 5 детей. Жена Омона работает в школе. Омон имеет средне-специальное образование. Он более восьми лет работает медбратом.
Также Омон на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Омон на сегодняшний день имеет одну корову и быка. Семья Омона обеспечена молоком и молочными продуктами.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Омон обратилась за кредитом в нашу организацию для закупа нескольких голов крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Омон будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса (увеличения количества скота).
texts.en: Omon is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 37 years old, married and has five children.  His wife works at a school.  Omon has a secondary-specialized education.  He has been working as a nurse for over eight years.  Omon has also been involved in animal husbandry for ten years.  Thanks to his hard work, today he has one cow and a bull.  Omon's family is provided with milk and dairy products.  In order to further develop his business, Omon requested a loan from our organization to purchase several heads of cattle.  He will invest the earnings from the loan into a continued development of his business (increasing livestock quantities).

loans.use: to buy a cow, bulls and calves

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha is 53 years old. She is a merchant who sells khangas. With these, she helps her customers present themselves well and she generates income to support her home. She has regular customers to whom she sells mostly on credit. Wherever Asha is, she identifies potential customers who will eventually buy from her. She is aware of opportunities and always taking advantage of them. Her goal for the future is to expand the business and venture into new businesses. Her biggest challenge in is obtaining resources to respond to her growing clientele quickly. She has to wait to get her money from her accounts receivable to be able to be effective. While she works hard and generates the main income for her home, she maintains a good profit margin. Right now, she is applying for a loan in the amount of Ksh 20,000. With it, she will buy more bundles of khangas for sale. This way, she will respond quickly to the customers who have made their orders and are expecting Asha to respond promptly.

loans.use: buy more bundles of khangas for sale.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a 31 year-old businesswoman.  She is married to Jackson, who is a businessman. They are blessed with two children.  She has been running a spare parts shop for the past four years, with a monthly income of KES.10,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD. after repaying the previous loan successfully. Emma will use the loan to buy more spare parts for sale. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to expand the business and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts for sale.

loans.name: Chorikul

texts.ru:
Чорикул житель района Шахритус. Ему 51 год. Он вдовец. У него четверо детей. Его дети работает в городе Душанбе. Сам Чорикул предоставляет услугу такси на арендованном автомобиле. В этой области Чорикул уже четыре года. 
Чорикул просит кредит для ремонта автомобиля.
texts.en: Chorikul is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 51 years old, a widower and has four children, all of whom work in the city of Dushanbe.  Chorikul provides a taxi service on a leased car.  He has been in this business for four years.  Chorikul is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Melodia

texts.en:
Melodia is married with 4 children. She is 53 years old and lives in Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Melodia sells snack foods to earn a living; she has had this business for 20 years. She has requested a loan of 6,500 PHP to purchase more snacks for her snack vending business.

Melodia is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more snacks for her snack vending business

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 64 years old, married, and with five children. He sells shoes to earn a living. He has engaged in this business for four years. Besides, he also does horticultural farming to generate extra income. He previously acquired a loan which helped him to grow his business. He also knows how to manage his business because he has been trained in business management. He dreams of expanding his business in the future. He needs a loan of 40,000 KES to buy more shoes for resale.

loans.use: To buy more shoes

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is married with two children. Alicia is 51 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Alicia sells dresses to earn a living and has had this business for 15 years. Each month, she earns 5000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6500 PHP to purchase more dresses for her clothing business.

Alicia is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Alicia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses for her clothing business

loans.name: Abbot

texts.en: Abbot is 25 years old and married. He sells clothes to earn a living, in a busy environment with reliable customers. He has been in the business for three years. His business has grown since he became a client of Faulu Kenya, because he has been trained in business management. Abbot dreams of expanding his business in the future. He needs a loan of 50,000 KES to buy women's and children's clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 27 years old, married and blessed with two children. She has been running a retail shop for the last five years, earning a monthly income of 25,000 KES. 

Margret has applied for a loan of 50,000 KES from KADET LTD. She plans to add more stock of wheat flour, cooking fat, and salt for sale.

The anticipated profits will be ploughed back into the business for expansion. Her dream for the future is to be successful in life.

loans.use: to add more stock of wheat flour, cooking fat, and salt for sale.

loans.name: Mamur

texts.ru:
Мамур проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 52 года. Мамур живет с женой. Жена Мамура домохозяйка. Его старший сын занимается бизнесом а младший работает в городе Худжанд.
Мамур имеет высшее образование. По профессии он агроном. Мамур более десяти лет работает в этой области. Кроме того он занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. 
При доме Мамур имеет большой участок земли, где выращивает овощи. В этой области Мамур имеет богатый опыт. Он берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Mamur lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 52 years old and lives with his wife, who is a homemaker.  His oldest son is involved in a business, and the youngest works in the city of Khujand.  Mamur has a higher education.  He is an agronomist.  Mamur has been working in this field for over ten years.  Besides this work, he is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  He has a large plot of land by his house, where he grows vegetables.  Mamur has a rich experience in this field.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is married with two children. She is 37 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Divina owns a general store business to earn a living and has had this business for fifteen years. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6,500 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Divina is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 39 years old. He is married with two children. He operates a quarry and has been in the business for the past 11 years.

This is his second loan in KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a field officer. He will use the loan amount to purchase a dairy cow.

He hopes to diversify his business and become a dairy farmer.

loans.use: to purchase a  dairy cow

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 31 years old, married and with two children. He operates a retail shop to earn a living. Besides that, he is also employed. He has been in the business for five years. He previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya which helped him to grow his business. He also knows how to save because he has been trained in financial management. He dreams of operating a wholesale business in the future. He needs a loan of 80,000 KES to buy cooking oil, bread and maize flour.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, bread and maize flour.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila  is married with four children and all her children go to school.  She has a business selling used shoes. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more   bales of used shoes.  She has been in this business for 9 years and doesn’t take care of additional family members.  She works at the market and sells to all categories of people.  

Jamila's major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. She is aspiring of becoming a wholesaler and also to start importing used shoes. She resides in her own house but the family has no access   to electricity or piped water.  Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used shoes

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es:
El Sr. Alcides tiene 28 años, esta acompañado con la Sra. Sandra de 24 años de edad, ellos tienen un hijo, por quien luchan siempre con toda su fuerza.
Don Alcides empezó como carpintero, hace más de cinco años,  desde el año: 2.007. Él comenzó como aprendiz en una carpintería ajena, durante mucho tiempo estuvo trabajando de esa manera. Hasta que con la ayuda de su padre y su dinero que junto pudo salir adelante.
El solicita le crédito para la compra de maderas e insumos que desea utilizar para poder cumplir con los pedidos que tiene de sus clientes. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, pues le será muy provechoso.
texts.en:
Alcides is 28 years old and his companion is Sandra, aged 24, and they have one child, for whom he always fights with all his strength.

Alcides began working as a carpenter more than five years ago, in 2007.  He began his work as an apprentice carpenter in someone else's workshop, and for a long time he was working in this way.  Finally, with the help of his father and the money they got together, he was able to move forward.

The loan he is asking is for buying wood and materials that he wants to use to finish the requests he has from his customers.  He is thankful for the help he is being given, since it will be very beneficial.

loans.use: to buy wood and supplies.

loans.name: Humberto Alfonso

texts.es: Humberto con su compra de 35 galones de lubricantes de diferentes marcas, le fue muy bien, porque aumentó sus ventas, hoy  su negocio goza de una buena clientela y esto fue gracias a su credikiva, con el cual se encuentra muy entusiasmado, por eso está aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento,   el cual invertirá en repuestos para motocicletas y mas lubricante, pues es un producto que rota rápidamente, porque está comprando en mayor volumen y esto hace que pueda ofrecer mejores precios a su clientela. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Estoy muy agradecido… que Dios los bendiga , gracias a ustedes he logrado mejorar mi negocio espero sigan confiando en mi y me apoyen nuevamente. “
texts.en: Humberto was very successful with his purchase of 35 gallons of different brands of lubricants, as he was able to increase his sales. Today his business benefits from good clientele, as a direct result of his previous Kiva loan, and he is therefore applying for a new loan at this time. He plans to invest the new loan in motorcycle parts and more lubricant, as it is a product with high rotation since it is usually purchased in high volumes so he can offer his clients better prices. His message to Kiva lenders is the following: "I am very grateful...may God bless you, thanks to all of you I have been able to improve my business and I hope that you will continue believing in me in and support me again."

loans.use: to invest in motorcycle parts and lubricants

loans.name: Marcela Liliana

texts.es: Marcela de 33 años, se dedica al comercio de productos cosméticos mediante guidas especializadas, desde hace 9 años cuando empezó vendiendo pocas mercancías, para obtener ingresos  que respondieras a su sostenimiento. Desde al año 2005 inició su negocio de venta de productos de belleza  en la modalidad de crédito y de contado, entre una clientela que desde ese tiempo ha ido construyendo y que continua en un ascendente crecimiento. Sus principales clientes son mujeres aunque maneja también líneas de artículos que impactan al género masculino y algunos de ellos le compran. Marcela vende con una frecuencia diaria y durante 8 horas en las cuales permanece en contacto con su clientela. Mientras sus   compras las realiza mensualmente en laboratorios que ofrecen sus productos mediante catálogos, que ella  utiliza para promocionar la oferta del mes. Su meta mas adelante es tener una boutique adecuando una habitación en su vivienda donde logre tener inventarios a precios muy económicos y se incrementen sus ventas. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará productos de aseo personal, protectores para la piel, cosméticos, cremas limpiadoras, shampoo etc. aprovechando que por sus compras están ofreciendo descuentos especiales y que su clientela se siente muy agradecida cuando ella le propone los mejores precios del mercado y esto es justamente lo que hace de credikiva una inversión exitosa..
texts.en:
Marcela is 33 years old, and makes a living selling cosmetics. She started her business nine years ago, and began by selling small quantities of merchandise in order to support her family. She started her beauty business in 2005 selling products on credit and in cash to an increasing customer base. The majority of her clients are women, though she also sells products for men. Marcela works 8 hours every day, and is in constant contact with her clients.

Marcela buys her products monthly from catalogs and distributors, and she uses the catalogs to promote the products as well. Her goal is to open her own boutique in a room of her house where she can sell products at affordable prices and increase her sales. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase additional products to further stock her business, such as: personal hygiene products, skincare products, cosmetics, cleansing creams, shampoo, etc. As she makes bulk purchases, she is able to receive discounts and pass those lower prices on to her customers. This ideal exchange is exactly what a Kiva loan promotes, a successful investment.

loans.use: to purchase personal hygiene products, skincare products, cosmetics, cleansing creams and shampoo.
